title: Folkways 70's headline typeface
content:
Hey, I’m wondering if any of you know what this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201154223im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FW04255_6703.jpg)

 [‹ (x) “Swiss etc.” newspaper text face - Esperanto {Fabienne (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201154223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16826 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201154223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46953 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bergh

comments.content: I thought it might have been [Motter Tektura](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201154223/http:/www.paratype.ru/pstore/fonts/Motter-Tektura.htm) before I checked.

It’s like somebody mixed various bauhaus style typefaces together: the ’e’s are very Avant Garde, the ’s’s look like the alternate ’S’ from Avant Garde, parts of it look like Yagi Universal, &c. &c.

- Lex
